head.title: Bush in Europe: An Uneasy Alliance

hedline.hl1: Bush in Europe: An Uneasy Alliance

block.p: It seems that much of the criticism that President Bush is facing in Europe centers on his rejection of the Kyoto Protocol on global warming (front page, June 12). If that is the case, it is either ignorance on the part of the typical European or sheer hypocrisy on the part of the governments in the countries that Mr. Bush is visiting; not one has ratified the treaty.
